A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Seems like neckbeards are coming out of the woodworks to rate this movie (that they have seen multiple times and own the blue ray for) poorly.  Was it perfect?  No.  Was it better than ALL of the prequels and  as good as Eps 6 and 7 though not as strong as 4 and 5 nor is it as good as Rogue One.  This movie did not kill the franchise nor did Disney- had it remained in the hands of Lucas\, we would have never had more movies and if we did\, they would be the Prequels all over again.
